'''Violet Ibis''' is a type of bird. It can be found both as [[Wildlife]] and as a pet in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

Outdoor animals can only be placed in outdoor spaces within the [[Housing]] system.

==Drops==
{{Card|Fowl|2}}

Killing one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
<gallery hideaddbutton="true" captionalign="center">

</gallery>

==Trivia==
* The bird may be based off the {{w|Crested ibis}} in real life, also called "toki" {{Lang|ja=トキ}}, or the Japanese crested ibis.
